verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep the incense burning On the altar fire Let thy heart's petition Let thy deep desire Be a cloud of incense Wreathing God's own throne Till his will among us Shall be fully done{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep the incense Burning on the altar fire Feed the flame Lord Jesus Till Thy whole desire Shall in us Thy children Find free course and be Breathed through lips anointed For this ministry{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep the incense burning Though thy faith be weak Though in words you cannot All thy longing speak Silent heart petitions, Spirit-taught will be Gloriously answered; Wrought by God for thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep the incense burning Hourly let it rise, Till from opened heavens Till from flame swept skies Fire shall fall and kindle All hearts to a flame Making us a glory To our Savior's name{/lang-eng}
